product.product_description: This product is used as the base of a henna paste.
This product is an essential ingredient for creating a henna paste. It can also be used to seal the design once the product has hardened.

product_listing.product_description: This product is used as a non-traditional black henna mix.

product.name: Henna Design Starter Kit
product.product_description: This product includes all the essentials for the creation of henna designs.
